GSP33ramgbhpu:580: yām imām puṣpitāṃ vācaṃ pravadanty avipaścitaḥ /

GSP33ramgbhpu:587: āpātaramaṇīyāṃ vācam avipaścitaḥ alpajñāḥ bhogāiśvaryagatiṃ prati vartamānāṃ pravadanti,

GSP33ramgbhpu:595: teṣāṃ bhogāiśvaryaprasaktānāṃ tayā vācā bhogāiśvaryaviṣayayā apahṛtajñānānāṃ yathoditavyavasāyātmikā buddhiḥ,

GSP33ramgbhpu:607: tadviṣayā vedāḥ tamaḥpracurāṇāṃ rajaḥpracurāṇāṃ sattvapracurāṇāṃ ca vatsalataratayaiva hitam avabodhayanti vedāḥ /

GSP33ramgbhpu:618: aprāptasya prāptir yogaḥ prāptasya parikṣaṇaṃ kṣemaḥ /

GSP33ramgbhpu:628: ataḥ sattvasthasya mumukṣor etāvad evopādeyam ity āha
GSP33ramgbhpu:629: karmaṇy evādhikāras te mā phaleṣu kadācana /

GSP33ramgbhpu:645: yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanañjaya /

GSP33ramgbhpu:647: rājyabandhuprabhṛtiṣu saṅgaṃ tyaktvā yuddhādīni karmāṇi yogasthaḥ kuru,
GSP33ramgbhpu:649: tad idaṃ siddhyasiddhyos samatvaṃ yogastha ity atra yogaśabdenocyate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:651: kim artham idam asakṛd ucyata ity ata āha
GSP33ramgbhpu:652: dūreṇa hy avaraṃ karma buddhiyogād dhanañjaya /

GSP33ramgbhpu:659: ataḥ karmaṇi kriyamāṇe uktāyāṃ buddhau śaraṇam anviccha /

GSP33ramgbhpu:674: tadā gantāsi nirvedaṃ śrotavyasya śrutasya ca // BhG_2.52 //

GSP33ramgbhpu:676: tadā asmattaḥ itaḥ pūrvaṃ tyājyatayā śrutasya phalādeḥ itaḥ paścāc chrotavyasya ca kṛte svayam eva nirvedaṃ gantāsi gamiṣyasi // BhGR_2.52 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:677: “yoge tv imāṃ śṛṇu” ityādinoktasyātmayāthātmyajñānapūrvakasya buddhiviśeṣasaṃskṛtasya dharmānuṣṭhānasya lakṣabhūtaṃ yogākhyaṃ phalam āha
GSP33ramgbhpu:679: samādhāv acalā buddhis tadā yogam avāpsyasi // BhG_2.53 //

GSP33ramgbhpu:695: vṛttiviśeṣakathanena svarūpam apy uktaṃ bhavatīti vṛttiviśeṣa ucyate
GSP33ramgbhpu:697: prajahāti yadā kāmān sarvān pārtha manogatān /

GSP33ramgbhpu:705: priyaviśleṣādiduḥkhanimitteṣu upasthiteṣu anudvignamanāḥ na duḥkhī bhavati;
GSP33ramgbhpu:706: sukheṣu vigataspṛhaḥ priyeṣu sannihiteṣv api vigataspṛhaḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:713: evaṃbhūtaḥ muniḥ ātmamananaśīlaḥ sthitadhīr ity ucyate // BhGR_2.56 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:715: yaḥ sarvatrānabhisnehas tat tat prāpya śubhāśubham /

GSP33ramgbhpu:725: indriyārthebhyaḥ sarvaśaḥ pratisaṃhṛtya mana ātmany avasthāpayati,

GSP33ramgbhpu:733: nirāhārasya viṣayebhyaḥ pratyāhṛtendriyasya dehino viṣayā vinivartamānā rasavarjaṃ vinivartante;
GSP33ramgbhpu:736: rāgo 'py ātmasvarūpaṃ viṣayebhyaḥ paraṃ sukhataraṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate // BhGR_2.59 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:737: yatato hy api kaunteya puruṣasya vipaścitaḥ /

GSP33ramgbhpu:746: asya sarvasya parijihīrṣayā viṣayānurāgayuktatayā durjayānīndriyāṇi saṃyamya,

GSP33ramgbhpu:753: tadāha “vaśe hi yasyendriyāṇi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā“+iti // BhGR_2.61 //

GSP33ramgbhpu:756: saṅgāt saṃjāyate kāmaḥ kāmāt krodho 'bhijāyate // BhG_2.62 //

GSP33ramgbhpu:778: uktena prakāreṇa mayi sarveśvare cetasaś śubhāśrayabhūte nyastamanāḥ nirdagdhāśeṣakalmaṣatayā
GSP33ramgbhpu:779: rāgadveṣaviyuktair ātmavaśyair indriyaiḥ viṣayāṃś caran viṣayāṃs tiraskṛtya vartamānaḥ

GSP33ramgbhpu:809: āpūryamāṇam acalapratiṣṭhaṃ samudram āpaḥ praviśanti yadvat /

GSP33ramgbhpu:814: śabdādiṣv indriyagocaratām āpanneṣv anāpanneṣu ca svātmāvalokanatṛptyaiva yo na vikāram āpnoti,

GSP33ramgbhpu:819: vihāya kāmān yaḥ sarvān pumāṃś carati nisspṛhaḥ /

GSP33ramgbhpu:825: sa ātmānaṃ dṛṣṭvā śāntim adhigacchati // BhGR_2.71 //

GSP33ramgbhpu:1591: jñānāgniḥ sarvakarmāṇi bhasmasāt kurute tathā // BhG_4.37 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1594: na hi jñānena sadṛśaṃ pavitram iha vidyate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1595: tat svayaṃ yogasaṃsiddhaḥ kālenātmani vindati // BhG_4.38 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1596: yasmād ātmajñānena sadṛśaṃ pavitraṃ śuddhikaram iha jagati vastvantaraṃ na vidyate,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1598: tat tathāvidhaṃ jñānaṃ yathopadeśam aharaharanuṣṭhīyamānajñānākārakarmayogasaṃsiddhaḥ kālena svātmani svayam eva labhate // BhGR_4.38 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1601: jñānaṃ labdhvā parām śāntim acireṇādhigacchati // BhG_4.39 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1602: evam upadeśāj jñānaṃ labdhvā copadiṣṭajñānavṛddhau śraddhāvān tatparaḥ tatraiva niyatamanāḥ taditaraviṣayāt saṃyatendriyo 'cireṇa kālenoktalakṣaṇavipākadaśāpannaṃ jñānaṃ labhate,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1603: tathāvidhaṃ jñānaṃ labdhvā parām śāntim acireṇādhigacchati paraṃ nirvāṇam āpnoti // BhGR_4.39 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1605: nāyaṃ loko 'sti na paro na sukhaṃ saṃśayātmanaḥ // BhG_4.40 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1608: upadiṣṭe ca jñāne saṃśayātmā saṃśayamanāḥ vinaśyati vinaṣṭo bhavati /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1609: asminn upadiṣṭe ātmayāthātmyaviṣaye jñāne saṃśayātmano 'yam api prākṛto loko nāsti, na ca paraḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1614: ataḥ sukhalavabhāgitvam ātmani saṃśayātmano na saṃbhavati // BhGR_4.40 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1616: ātmavantaṃ na karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanañjaya // BhG_4.41 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1617: yathopadiṣṭayogena saṃnyastakarmāṇam jñānākāratāpannakarmāṇaṃ yathopadiṣṭena cātmajñānena ātmani saṃcchinnasaṃśayam,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1618: ātmavantaṃ manasvinam upadiṣṭārthe dṛḍhāvasthitamanasaṃ bandhahetubhūtaprācīnānantakarmāṇi na nibadhnanti // BhGR_4.41 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1620: chittvainaṃ saṃśayaṃ yogam ātiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhārata // BhG_4.42 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1621: tasmād anādyajñānasaṃbhūtaṃ hṛtstham ātmaviṣayaṃ saṃśayaṃ mayopadiṣṭenātmajñānāsinā chittvā mayopadiṣṭaṃ karmayogam ātiṣṭha;
GSP33ramgbhpu:1624: caturthe 'dhyāye karmayogasya jñānākāratāpūrvakasvarūpabhedo jñānāṃśasya ca prādhānyam uktam;
GSP33ramgbhpu:1625: jñānayogādhikāriṇo 'pi karmayogasyāntargatātmajñānatvād apramādatvāt sukaratvān nirapekṣatvāc ca jyāyastvaṃ tṛtīya evoktam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1626: idānīṃ karmayogasyātmaprāptisādhanatve jñānaniṣṭhāyāś śaighryaṃ karmayogāntargatākarṭrtvānusandhānaprakāraṃ ca pratipādya tanmūlaṃ jñānaṃ ca viśodhyate //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1628: saṃnyāsaṃ karmaṇāṃ kṛṣṇa punar yogaṃ ca śaṃsasi /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1629: yac chreya etayor ekaṃ tan me brūhi suniścitam // BhG_5.1 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1630: karmaṇāṃ saṃnyāsaṃ jñānayogam punaḥ karmayogaṃ ca śaṃsasi /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1631: etad uktaṃ bhavati dvitīye 'dhyāye mumukṣoḥ prathamaṃ karmayoga eva kāryaḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1632: karmayogena mṛditāntaḥkaraṇakaṣāyasya jñānayogenātmadarśanaṃ kāryam iti pratipādya punas tṛtīyacaturthayoḥ jñānayogādhikāradaśāpannasyāpi karmaniṣṭhaiva
GSP33ramgbhpu:1633: saiva jñānaniṣṭhānirapekṣā ātmaprāptau sādhanam iti karmaniṣṭhāṃ praśaṃśasi iti /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1634: tatraitayor jñānayogakarmayogayor ātmaprāptisādhanabhāve yad ekaṃ saukāryac chaighryāc ca śreyaḥ śreṣṭham iti suniścitam,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1638: tayos tu karmasaṃnyāsāt karmayogo viśiṣyate // BhG_5.2 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1640: karmayogaś ca jñānayogaśaktasyāpy ubhau nirapekṣau niśśreyasakarau /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1641: tayos tu karmasaṃnyāsāj jñānayogāt karmayoga eva viśiṣyate // BhGR_5.2 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1643: jñeyaḥ sa nityasaṃnyāsī yo na dveṣṭi na kāṅkṣati /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1644: nirdvandvo hi mahābāho sukhaṃ bandhāt pramucyate // BhG_5.3 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1645: yaḥ karmayogī tadantargatātmānubhavatṛptas tadvyatiriktaṃ kim api na kāṅkṣati,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1646: tata eva kim api na dveṣṭi,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1649: sa hi sukarakarmayoganiṣṭhatayā sukhaṃ bandhāt pramucyate // BhGR_5.3 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1651: sāṃkhyayogau pṛthag bālāḥ pravadanti na paṇḍitāḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1652: ekam apy āsthitas samyag ubhayor vindante phalam // BhG_5.4 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1653: jñānayogakarmayogau phalabhedāt pṛthag bhūtau ye pravadanti,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1654: te bālāḥ aniṣpannajñānāḥ na paṇḍitāḥ akṛtsnavidaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1656: jñānayogas tv eka ātmāvalokanaṃ sādhayatīti tayoḥ phalabhedena pṛthaktvaṃ vadanto na paṇḍitā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1657: ubhayor ātmāvalokanaikaphalayor ekaphalatvena ekam apy āsthitas tad eva phalaṃ labhate // BhGR_5.4 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1659: yat sāṃkhyaiḥ prāpyate sthānaṃ tad yogair api gamyate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1660: ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // BhG_5.5 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1664: evam ekaphalatvena ekaṃ vaikalpikaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1665: sa paśyati sa eva paṇḍita ityarthaḥ // BhGR_5.5 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1667: saṃnyāsas tu mahābāho duḥkham āptum ayogataḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1668: yogayukto munir brahma na cireṇādhigacchati // BhG_5.6 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1669: saṃnyāsaḥ jñānayogas tu ayogataḥ karmayogād rte prāptum aśakyaḥ;
GSP33ramgbhpu:1670: yogayuktaḥ karmayogayuktaḥ svayam eva muniḥ ātmamananaśīlaḥ sukhena karmayogaṃ sādhayitvā na cireṇa alpenaiva kālena brahmādhigacchati ātmānaṃ prāpnoti /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1671: jñānayogayuktas tu mahatā duḥkhena jñānayogaṃ sādhayati;
GSP33ramgbhpu:1674: sarvabhūtātmabhūtātmā kurvann api na lipyate // BhG_5.7 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1675: karmayogayuktas tu śāstrīye paramapuruṣārādhanarūpe viśuddhe karmaṇi vartamānaḥ tena viśuddhamanāḥ vijitātmā svābhyaste te karmaṇi vyāpṛtamanastvena sukhena vijitamanāḥ ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1676: tata eva jitendiyaḥ kartur ātmano yāthātmyānusandhānaniṣṭhatayā sarvabhūtātmabhūtātmā sarveṣāṃ devādibhūtānām ātmabhūta ātmā yasyāsau sarvabhūtātmabhūtātmā
GSP33ramgbhpu:1677: ātmayāthātmyam anusandhānasya hi devādīnāṃ svasya caikākāra ātmā;
GSP33ramgbhpu:1679: prakṛtiviyuktaḥ sarvatra devādideheṣu jñānaikākāratayā samānākāra iti “nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma” iti anantaram eva vakṣyate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1680: sa evaṃbhūtaḥ karma kurvann api anātmany ātmābhimānena na lipyate na saṃbadhyate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1682: yataḥ saukaryāc chaighryāc ca karmayoga eva śreyān,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1684: naiṣa kiñcit karomīti yukto manyeta tattvavit /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1685: paśyan śṛṇvan spṛśan jighran aśnan gacchan svapan śvasan // BhG_5.8 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1686: pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇan unmiṣan nimiṣann api /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1690: praṇāś ca svaviṣayeṣu vartanta iti dhārayan anusandhānaḥ nāhaṃ kiṃcit karomīti manyeta jñānaikasvabhāvasya mama karmamūlendriyaprāṇasaṃbandhakṛtam īdṛśaṃ kartṛtvam;
GSP33ramgbhpu:1692: brahmaṇy ādhāya karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā karoti yaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1693: lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatram ivāmbhasā // BhG_5.10 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1695: “mama yonir mahad brahma” iti hi vakṣyate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1696: indriyāṇāṃ prakṛtipariṇāmaviśeṣarūpatvena indriyākāreṇāvasthitāyāṃ prakṛtau “paśyañ chṛṇvan” ityādyuktaprakāreṇa karmāṇy ādhāya,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1698: naiva kiṃcit karomīti yaḥ karmāṇi karoti,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1699: sa prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭatayā vartamāno 'pi prakṛtyātmābhimānarūpeṇa bandhahetunā pāpena na lipyate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1700: padmapatram ivāmbhasā yathā padmapatram ambhasā saṃsṛṣṭam api na lipyate,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1702: kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1703: yoginaḥ karma kurvanti saṅgaṃ tyaktvātmaśuddhaye // BhG_5.11 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1704: kāyamanobuddhīndriyasādhyaṃ karma svargādiphalasaṅgaṃ tyaktvā yogina ātmaviśuddhaye kuranti;
GSP33ramgbhpu:1706: yuktaḥ karmaphalaṃ tyaktvā śāntim āpnoti naiṣṭhikīm /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1707: ayuktaḥ kāmakāreṇa phale sakto nibadhyate // BhG_5.12 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1709: karmaphalaṃ tyaktvā kevalam ātmaśuddhaye karmānuṣṭhāya naiṣṭhikīṃ śāntim āpnoti sthirām ātmānubhavarūpāṃ nirvṛtim āpnoti /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1710: ayuktaḥ ātmavyatiriktaphaleṣu capalaḥ ātmāvalokanavimukhaḥ kāmakāreṇa phale saktaḥ karmāṇi kurvan nityaṃ karmabhir badhyate nityasaṃsārī bhavati
GSP33ramgbhpu:1711: ataḥ phalasaṅgarahitaḥ indriyākāreṇa pariṇatāyāṃ prakṛtau karmāṇi saṃnyasya ātmano bandhamocanāyaiva karmāṇi kurvītetyuktaṃ bhavati // BhGR_5.12
GSP33ramgbhpu:1712: atha dehākāreṇa pariṇatāyāṃ prakṛtau kartṛtvasaṃnyāsa ucyate
GSP33ramgbhpu:1714: navadvāre pure dehī naiva kurvan na kārayan // BhGR_5.13 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1716: na svarūpaprayuktam iti vivekaviṣayeṇa manasā sarvāṇi karmāṇi navadvāre pure saṃnyasya
GSP33ramgbhpu:1717: dehī svayaṃ vaśī dehādhiṣṭhānaprayatnam akurvan dehaṃ ca naiva kārayan sukham āste // BhGR_5.13 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1719: na kartṛtvaṃ na karmāṇi lokasya sṛjati prabhuḥ /

GSP33ramgbhpu:1721: asya devatiryaṅmanuṣyasthāvarātmanā prakṛtisaṃsargeṇa vartamānasya lokasya devādyasādhāraṇaṃ kartṛtvaṃ tattadasādhāraṇāni karmāṇi tattatkarmajanyadevādiphalasaṃyogaṃ
GSP33ramgbhpu:1722: ayaṃ prabhuḥ akarmavaśyaḥ svābhāvikasvarūpeṇāvasthita ātmā na sṛjati notpādayati /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1727: nādatte kasyacit pāpaṃ na caiva sukṛtaṃ vibhuḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1728: ajñānenāvṛtaṃ jñānaṃ tena muhyanti jantavaḥ // BhG_5.15 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1729: kasyacit svasaṃbandhitayābhimatasya putrādeḥ pāpaṃ duḥkhaṃ nādatte nāpanudati /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1730: kasyacit pratikūlatayābhimatasya sukṛtaṃ sukhaṃ ca nādatte nāpanudati /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1738: ajñānenāvṛtaṃ jñānam jñānavirodhinā pūrvapūrvakarmaṇā svaphalānubhavayogyatvāya asya jñānam āvṛtaṃ saṃkucitam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1739: tena jñānāvaraṇarūpeṇa karmaṇā devādidehasaṃyogas tattadātmābhimānarūpamohaś ca jāyate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1746: “na hi jñānena sadṛśaṃ pavitram” iti pūrvoktaṃ svakāle saṃgamayati
GSP33ramgbhpu:1747: jñānena tu tad ajñānaṃ yeṣāṃ nāśitam ātmanaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1748: teṣām ādityavaj jñānaṃ prakāśayati tat param // BhG_5.16 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1749: evaṃ vartamāneṣu sarveṣv ātmasu yeṣām ātmanām uktalakṣaṇena ātmayāthātmyopadeśajanitena
GSP33ramgbhpu:1750: ātmaviṣayeṇa aharaharabhyāsādheyātiśayena niratiśayapavitreṇa jñānena tat jñānāvaraṇam
GSP33ramgbhpu:1752: teṣāṃ tat svābhāvikaṃ paraṃ jñānam aparimitam asaṃkucitam ādityavat sarvaṃ yathāvasthitaṃ prakāśayati /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1754: “na tv evāhaṃ jātu nāsam” ityupakramāvagatam atra spaṣṭataram uktam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1757: “teṣām ādityavaj jñānam” iti vyatirekanirdeśāj jñānasya svarūpānubandhidharmatvam uktam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1758: ādityadṛṣṭāntena ca jñātṛjñānayoḥ prabhāprabhāvator ivāvasthānaṃ ca /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1759: tata eva saṃsāradaśāyāṃ jñānasya karmaṇā saṃkoco mokṣadaśāyāṃ vikāsaś copapannaḥ // BhGR_5.16 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1765: tatparāyaṇāḥ tad eva paramaprayojanam iti manvānāḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1766: evam abhyasyamānena jñānena nirdhūtaprācīnakalmaṣāḥ tathāvidham ātmanam apunarāvṛttiṃ gacchanti /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1767: yad avasthād ātmanaḥ punarāvṛttir na vidyate,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1771: śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥ // BhG_5.18 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1774: gohastiśvaśvapacādiṣu atyantaviṣamākāratayā pratīyamāneṣu ātmasu paṇḍitāḥ ātmayāthātmyavidaḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1775: jñānaikākāratayā sarvatra samadarśinaḥ viṣamākāras tu prakṛteḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1776: nātmanaḥ; ātmā tu sarvatra jñānaikākāratayā sama iti paśyantītyarthaḥ // BhGR_5.18 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1777: ihaiva tair jitas svargo yeṣāṃ sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1778: nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma tasmād brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ // BhG_5.19 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1779: ihaiva sādhanānuṣṭhānadaśāyām eva taiḥ sargo jitaḥ saṃsāro jitaḥ;
GSP33ramgbhpu:1780: yeṣām uktarītyā sarveṣv ātmasu sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1783: ātmasāmye sthitāś ced brahmaṇi sthitā eva te;
GSP33ramgbhpu:1785: ātmasu jñānaikākāratayā sāmyam evānusandhānā muktā evetyarthaḥ // BhGR_5.19 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1786: yena prakāreṇāvathitasya karmayoginaḥ samadarśanarūpo jñanavipāko bhavati,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1788: na prahṛṣyet priyaṃ prāpya nodvijet prāpya cāpriyam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1789: sthirabuddhir asaṃmūḍho brahmavid brahmaṇi sthitaḥ // BhG_5.20 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1790: yādṛśadehasthasya yadavasthasya prācīnakarmavāsanayā yat priyaṃ bhavati,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1793: katham? sthirabuddhiḥ sthire ātmani buddhir yasya saḥ sthirabuddhiḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1794: asaṃmūḍho asthieṇa śarīreṇa sthiram ātmānam ekīkṛtya mohaḥ saṃmohaḥ;
GSP33ramgbhpu:1798: upadeśena brahmavit san tasmin brahmaṇy abhyāsayuktaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1799: etad uktaṃ bhavati tattvavidām upadeśena ātmayāthātmyavid bhūtvā tatraiva yatamāno
GSP33ramgbhpu:1801: prākṛte priyāpriye prāpya harṣodevegau na kuryād iti // BhGR_5.20 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1802: bāhyasparśeṣv asaktātmā vindaty ātmani yaḥ sukham /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1803: sa brahmayogayuktātmā sukham akṣayam aśnute // BhG_5.21 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1805: asaktātmā asaktamanāḥ antarātmany eva yaḥ sukhaṃ vindati labhate,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1806: sa prakṛtyabhyāsaṃ vihāya brahmayogayuktātmā brahmābhyāsayuktamanāḥ brahmānubhavarūpam akṣayaṃ sukhaṃ prāpnoti // BhGR_5.21 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1808: ye hi saṃsparśajā bhogā duḥkhayonaya eva te /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1809: ādyantavantaḥ kaunteya na teṣu ramate budhaḥ // BhG_5.22 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1810: viṣayendriyasparśajāḥ ye bhogāḥ duḥkhayonayas te duḥkhodarkāḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:1814: kāmakrodhodbhavaṃ vegaṃ sa yuktaḥ sa sukhī naraḥ // BhG_5.23 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1815: śarīravimokṣaṇāt prāk ih+eva sādhanānuṣṭhānadaśāyam eva ātmānubhavaprītyā kāmakrodhodbhavaṃ vegaṃ soḍhuṃ niroddhuṃ yaḥ śaknoti,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1817: sa eva śarīravimokṣottarakālam ātmānubhavaikasukhas saṃpatsyate // BhGR_5.23 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1819: sa yogī brahma nirvāṇaṃ brahmabhūto 'dhigacchati // BhG_5.24 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:1820: yo bāhyaviṣayānubhavaṃ sarvaṃ vihāya antassukhaḥ ātmānubhavaikasukhaḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:1821: antarārāmaḥ ātmaikodyānaḥ svaguṇair ātmaiva sukhavardhako yasya sa tathoktaḥ,

GSP33ramgbhpu:3776: vaktrāṇi te tvaramāṇā viśanti daṃṣṭrākarālāni bhayānakāni /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3777: kecid vilagnā daśanāntareṣu saṃdṛśyante cūrṇitair uttamāṅgaiḥ // BhG_11.27 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3778: amī dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāḥ duryodhanādayas sarve bhīṣmo droṇaḥ sūtaputraḥ karṇaś ca tatpakṣīyair avanipālasamūhaiḥ sarvaiḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3779: asmadīyair api kaiścid yodhamukhyais saha tvaramāṇā daṃṣṭrākarālāni bhayānakāni tava vaktrāṇi vināśāya viśanti;
GSP33ramgbhpu:3780: tatra kecic cūrṇitair uttamāṅgair daśānāntareṣu vilagnās saṃdṛśyante // BhGR_11.26,27 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3781: yathā nadīnāṃ bahavo 'mbuvegāḥ samudram evābhimukhā dravanti /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3782: tathā tavāmī naralokavīrā viśanti vaktrāṇy abhivijvalanti // BhG_11.28 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3783: yathā pradīptajvalanaṃ pataṅgā viśanti nāśāya samṛddhavegāḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3784: tathaiva nāśāya viśanti lokās tavāpi vaktrāṇi samṛddhavegāḥ // BhG_11.29 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3788: tava vaktrāṇy abhivijvalanti svayam eva tvaramāṇā ātmanāśāya viśanti // BhGR_11.28,29 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3789: lelihyase grasamānaḥ samantāl lokān samagrān vadanair jvaladbhiḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3790: tejobhir āpūrya jagat samagraṃ bhāsas tavogrāḥ pratapanti viṣṇo // BhG_11.30 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3791: rājalokān samagrān jvaladbhir vadanair grasamānaḥ kopavegena tadrudhirāvasiktamoṣṭhapuṭādikaṃ lelihyase punaḥ punar lehanaṃ karoṣi /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3792: tavātighorā bhāsaḥ raśmayaḥ tejobhiḥ svakīyaiḥ prakāśaiḥ jagat samagram āpūrya pratapanti // BhGR_11.30 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3793: ākhyāhi me ko bhavān ugrarūpo namo 'stu te devavara prasīda /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3794: vijñātum icchāmi bhavantam ādyaṃ na hi prajānāmi tava pravṛttim // BhG_11.31 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3795: “darśayātmānam avyayam” iti tavāiśvaryaṃ niraṅkuśaṃ sākṣātkartuṃ prārthitena bhavatā niraṅkuśam aiśvaryaṃ darśayatā atighorarūpam idam āviṣkṛtam
GSP33ramgbhpu:3797: kiṃ kartuṃ pravṛtta iti bhavantaṃ jñātum icchāmi /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3803: anenābhiprāyeṇedaṃ saṃhartṛrūpam āviṣkṛtam ity uktvā prasannarūpaś ca bhava // BhGR_11.31 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3804: āśritavātsalyātirekeṇa viśvāiśvaryaṃ darśayato bhavato ghorarūpāviṣkāre ko 'bhiprāya iti pṛṣṭo bhagavān pārthasārathiḥ svābhiprāyam āha,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3805: pārthodyogena vināpi dhārtarāṣṭrapramukham aśeṣaṃ rājalokaṃ nihantum aham eva pravṛtta iti jñāpanāya mama ghorarūpāviṣkāraḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3808: kālo 'smi lokakṣayakṛt pravṛddho lokān samāhartum iha pravṛttaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3809: ṛte 'pi tvā na bhaviṣyanti sarve ye 'vasthitāḥ pratyanīkeṣu yodhāḥ // BhG_11.32 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3811: sarveṣāṃ dhārtarāṣṭrapramukhānāṃ rājalokānām āyuravasānaṃ gaṇayann ahaṃ tatkṣayakṛd ghorarūpeṇa pravṛddho rājalokān samāhartum ābhimukhyena saṃhartum iha pravṛtto 'smi /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3812: ato matsaṃkalpād eva tvām ṛte 'pi tvadudyogād rte 'pi ete dhārtarāṣṭrapramukhās tava pratyanīkeṣu ye 'vasthitā yodhāḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3813: te sarve na bhaviṣyanti vinaṅkṣyanti // BhGR_11.32 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3814: tasmāt tvam uttiṣṭha yaśo labhasva jitvā śatrūn bhuṅkṣva rājyaṃ samṛddham /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3815: mayaivaite nihatāḥ pūrvam eva nimittamātraṃ bhava savyasācin // BhG_11.33 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3819: mayaivaite kṛtāparādhāḥ pūrvam eva nihatāḥ hanane viniyuktāḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3820: tvaṃ tu teṣāṃ hanane nimittamātraṃ bhava /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3827: droṇaṃ ca bhīṣmaṃ ca jayadrathaṃ ca karṇaṃ tathānyān api yodhamukhyān /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3828: mayā hatāṃs tvaṃ jahi mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ yudhyasva jetāsi raṇe sapatnān // BhG_11.34 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3829: droṇabhīṣmakarṇādīn kṛtāparādhatayā mayaiva hanane viniyuktān tvaṃ jahi tvaṃ hanyāḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3830: etān gurūn bandhūṃś ca anyān api bhogasaktān kathaṃ haniṣyāmīti mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ tān uddiśya dharmādharmabhayena bandhusnehena kāruṇyena ca mā vyathāṃ kṛthāḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3831: yatas te kṛtāparādhā mayaiva hanane viniyuktāḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3835: api tu jaya eva labhyata ityarthaḥ // BhGR_11.34 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3837: etac chrutvā vacanaṃ keśavasya kṛtāñjalir vepamānaḥ kirīṭī /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3838: namaskṛtvā bhūya evāha kṛṣṇaṃ sagadgadaṃ bhītabhītaḥ praṇamya // BhG_11.35 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3839: etad aśritavātsalyajaladheḥ keśavasya vacanaṃ śrutvā arjunas tasmai namaskṛtya bhītabhīto bhūyas taṃ praṇamya kṛtāñjalir vepamānaḥ kirīṭī sagadgadam āha // BhGR_11.35 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3840: sthāne hṛṣīkeśa tava prakīrtyā jagat prahṛṣyaty anurajyate ca /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3841: rakṣāṃsi bhītāni diśo dravanti sarve namasyanti ca siddhasaṅghāḥ // BhG_11.36 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3844: tvatprasādāt tvāṃ sarveśvaram avalokya tava prakīrtyā sarvaṃ prahṛṣyati,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3846: yac ca tvām avalokya rakṣāṃsi bhītāni sarvā diśaḥ pradravanti,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3847: sarve siddhasaṃghāḥ siddhādyanukūlasaṃghāḥ namasyanti ca tad etat sarvaṃ yuktam iti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ // BhGR_11.36 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3849: kasmāc ca te na nameran mahātman garīyase brahmaṇo 'py ādikartre /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3850: mahātman, te tubhyaṃ garīyase brahmaṇaḥ hiraṇyagarbhasyāpi ādibhūtāya kartre hiraṇyagarbhādayaḥ kasmād dhetor na namaskuryuḥ // BhGR_11.37ab
GSP33ramgbhpu:3851: ananta deveśa jagannivāsa tvam akṣaraṃ sad asat tat paraṃ yat // BhG_11.37 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3854: “na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit” ity ādiśrutisiddho jīvātmā hi na kṣarati /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3855: sad asac ca tvam eva sadasacchabdanirdiṣṭaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvenāvasthitaṃ prakṛtitattvaṃ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3856: nāmarūpavibhāgavattayā kāryāvasthaṃ sacchabdanirdiṣṭaṃ tadanarhatayā kāraṇāvastham asacchabdanirdiṣṭaṃ ca tvam eva /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3857: tat param yat tasmāt prakṛteḥ prakṛtisaṃbandhinaś ca jīvātmanaḥ param anyan muktātmatattvaṃ yat,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3859: tvam ādidevaḥ puruṣaḥ purāṇas tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3863: nidhīyate tvayi viśvam iti tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam;
GSP33ramgbhpu:3864: viśvasya śarīrabhūtasyātmatayā paramādhārabhūtas tvam evetyarthaḥ // BhGR_11.37 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3865: vettāsi vedyaṃ ca paraṃ ca dhāma tvayā tataṃ viśvam anantarūpa // BhG_11.38 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3866: jagati sarvo veditā vedyaṃ ca sarvaṃ tvam eva /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3867: evaṃ sarvātmatayāvasthitas tvam eva paraṃ ca dhāma sthānam;
GSP33ramgbhpu:3870: tvayātmatvena viśvaṃ cidacinmiśraṃ jagat tataṃ vyāptam // BhGR_11.38 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3871: atas tvam eva vāyvādiśabdavācya ity āha
GSP33ramgbhpu:3872: vāyur yamo 'gnir varuṇaś śaśāṅkaḥ prajāpatis tvaṃ prapitāmahaś ca /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3878: pitāmahādīnām ātmatayā tattacchabdavācyas tvam evetyarthaḥ // BhGR_11.39ab //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3879: atyadbhutākāraṃ bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā harṣotphullanayano 'tyantasādhvasāvanataḥ sarvato namaskaroti //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3880: namo namas te 'stu sahasrakṛtvaḥ punaś ca bhūyo 'pi namo namas te // BhG_11.39 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3881: namaḥ purastād atha pṛṣṭhatas te namo 'stu te sarvata eva sarva /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3882: anantavīryāmitavikramas tvaṃ sarvaṃ samāpnoṣi tato 'si sarvaḥ // BhG_11.40 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3886: yatas tvaṃ sarvaṃ cidacidvastujātam ātmatayā samāpnoṣi,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3887: ataḥ sarvasya cidacidvastujātasya tvaccharīratayā tvatprakāratvāt sarvaprakāras tvam eva sarvaśabdavācyo 'sītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3889: “vāyur yamo 'gniḥ” ityādisarvasāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśasyātmatayā vyāptir eva hetur iti suvyaktam uktam,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3891: “sarvaṃ samāpnoṣi tato 'si sarvaḥ” iti ca // BhGR_11.40 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3892: sakheti matvā prasabhaṃ yad uktaṃ he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3893: ajānatā mahimānaṃ tavemaṃ mayā pramādāt praṇayena vāpi // BhG_11.41 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3895: eko 'tha vāpy acyuta tatsamakṣaṃ tat kṣāmaye tvām aham aprameyam // BhG_11.42 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3897: tam imam ajānatā mayā pramādān mohāt,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3898: praṇayena ciraparicayena vā sakheti mama vayasyaḥ iti matvā,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3901: he sakhā iti tvayi prasabham vinayāpetaṃ yad uktaṃ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3902: yac ca prihāsārthaṃ sarvadaiva satkārārhas tvam asatkṛto 'si,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3903: vihāraśayyāsanabhojaneṣu ca sahakṛteṣu ekānte vaḥ samakṣaṃ vā yad asatkṛto 'si;
GSP33ramgbhpu:3904: tat sarvaṃ tvām aprameyam ahaṃ kṣāmaye // BhGR_11.41,42 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3905: pitāsi lokasya carācarasya tvam asya pūjyaś ca guru garīyān /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3906: na tvatsamo 'sty abhyadhikaḥ kuto 'nyo lokatraye 'py apratimaprabhāva // BhG_11.43 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3908: tvam asya sarvasya carācarasya lokasya pitāsi /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3910: atas tvam asya carācarasya lokasya garīyān pūjyatamaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3911: na tvatsamo 'sty abhyadhikaḥ kuto 'nyaḥ lokatraye 'pi tvadanyaḥ kāruṇyādinā kenāpi guṇena na tvatsamo 'sti /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3913: tasmāt praṇamya praṇidhāya kāryaṃ prasādaye tvām aham īśam īḍyam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3914: piteva putrasya sakheva sakhyuḥ priyaḥ priyāyārhasi deva soḍhum // BhG_11.44 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3915: yasmāt tvaṃ sarvasya pitā pūjyatamo guruś ca kāruṇyādiguṇaiś ca sarvādhiko 'si,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3916: tasmāt tvām īśam īḍyaṃ praṇamya praṇidhāya ca kāyaṃ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3919: praṇāmapūrvaṃ prārthitaḥ pitā vā sakhā vā prasīdati;
GSP33ramgbhpu:3920: tathā tvaṃ paramakāruṇikaḥ priyāya me sarvaṃ soḍhum arhasi // BhGR_11.44 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3921: adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ hṛṣito 'smi dṛṣṭvā bhayena ca pravyathitaṃ mano me /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3922: tad eva me darśaya deva rūpaṃ prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa // BhG_11.45 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3923: adṛṣṭapūrvam atyadbhutam atyugraṃ ca tava rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣito 'smi prīto 'smi /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3925: atas tad eva tava suprasannaṃ rūpaṃ me darśaya /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3926: prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa mayi prasādaṃ kuru,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3929: kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakrahastam icchāmi tvāṃ draṣṭum ahaṃ tathaiva /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3930: tenaiva rūpeṇa caturbhujena sahasrabāho bhava viśvamūrte // BhG_11.46 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3932: kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakrahastaṃ tvāṃ draṣṭum icchāmi /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3933: atas tenaiva pūrvasiddhena caturbhujena rūpeṇa yukto bhava /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3934: sahasrabāho viśvamūrte idānīṃ sahasrabāhutvena viśvaśarīratvena dṛśyamānarūpas tvaṃ tenaiva rūpeṇa yukto bhavetyarthaḥ // BhGR_11.46 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3936: mayā prasannena tavārjunedaṃ rūpaṃ paraṃ darśitam ātmayogāt /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3937: tejomayaṃ viśvam anantam ādyaṃ yan me tvadanyena na dṛṣṭapūrvam // BhG_11.47 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3944: tvadanyena kenāpi na dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ rūpam tad idaṃ prasannena mayā madbhaktāya te darśitam;
GSP33ramgbhpu:3946: ananyabhaktivyatiriktaiḥ sarvair apy upāyair yathāvad avasthito 'haṃ draṣṭuṃ na śakya ity āha
GSP33ramgbhpu:3947: na vedayajñādhyayanair na dānair na ca kriyābhir na tapobhir ugraiḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3948: evaṃrūpaś śakya ahaṃ nṛloke draṣṭuṃ tvadanyena kurupravīra // BhG_11.48 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3949: evaṃrūpo yathāvad avathito 'haṃ mayi bhaktimatas tvatto 'nyena ekāntabhaktirahitena kenāpi puruṣeṇa vedayajñādibhiḥ kevalair draṣṭuṃ na śakyaḥ
GSP33ramgbhpu:3950: mā te vyathā mā ca vimūḍhabhāvo dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ ghoram īdṛṅ mamedam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3951: vyapetabhīḥ prītamanāḥ punas tvaṃ tad eva me rūpam idaṃ prapaśya // BhG_11.49 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3955: tvayā abhyastapūrvam eva saumyaṃ rūpaṃ darśayāmi,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3956: tad evedaṃ mama rūpaṃ prapaśya // BhGR_11.49 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3958: ity arjunaṃ vāsudevas tathoktvā svakaṃ rūpaṃ darśayām āsa bhūyaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3959: āśvāsayām āsa ca bhītam enaṃ bhūtvā punas saumyavapur mahātmā // BhG_11.50 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3960: evaṃ pāṇḍutanayaṃ bhagavān vasudevasūnur uktvā bhūyaḥ svakīyam eva caturbhujaṃ rūpaṃ darśayām āsa;
GSP33ramgbhpu:3961: aparicitarupadarśanena bhītam enaṃ punar api paricitasaumyavapur bhūtvā āśvāsayām āsa ca,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3963: asya sarveśvarasya paramapuruṣasya parasya brahmaṇo jagadupakṛtimartyasya vasudevasūnoś caturbhujam eva svakīyaṃ rūpam;
GSP33ramgbhpu:3964: kaṃsād bhītavasudevaprārthanena ākaṃsavadhād bhujadvayam upasaṃhṛtaṃ paścād āviṣkṛtaṃ ca /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3967: ..... upasaṃhara viśvātman rūpam etac caturbhujam” iti hi prārthitam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3968: śiśupālasyāpi dviṣato 'navaratabhāvanāviṣayaś caturbhujam eva vasudevasūno rūpam,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3970: ataḥ pārthenātra tenaiva rūpeṇa caturbhujanety ucyate // BhGR_11.50 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3972: dṛṣṭvedaṃ mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ tava saumyaṃ janārdana /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3973: idānīm asmi saṃvṛttaḥ sacetāḥ prakṛtiṃ gataḥ // BhG_11.51 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3974: anavadhikātiśayasaundaryasaukumāryalāvaṇyādiyuktaṃ tavaivāsādhāraṇaṃ manuṣyatvasaṃsthānasaṃsthitam atisaumyam idaṃ tava rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā idānīṃ sacetās saṃvṛtto 'smi;
GSP33ramgbhpu:3977: sudurdarśam idaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi yan mama /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3978: devā apy asya rūpasya nityaṃ darśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // BhG_11.52 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3979: mama idaṃ sarvasya praśāsane 'vasthitaṃ sarvāsrayaṃ sarvakāraṇabhūtaṃ rūpaṃ yad dṛṣṭavān asi,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3980: tat sudurdarśaṃ na kenāpi draṣṭuṃ śakyam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3981: asya rūpasya devā api nityaṃ darśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3984: nāhaṃ vedair na tapasā na dānena na cejyayā /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3985: śakya evaṃvidho draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭavān asi mām yathā // BhG_11.53 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3986: bhaktyā tv ananyayā śakya aham evaṃvidho 'rjuna /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3987: jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tattvena praveṣṭuṃ ca parantapa // BhG_11.54 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3989: yāgadānahomatapobhiś ca madbhaktivirahitaiḥ kevalaiḥ yathāvad avasthito 'haṃ draṣṭum aśakyaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3990: ananyayā tu bhaktyā tattvataś śāstrair jñātuṃ tattvatas sākṣātkartuṃ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3993: “nāyam ātmā pravacanena labhyo na medhayā na bahunā śrutena /
GSP33ramgbhpu:3994: yam evaiṣa vṛṇute tena labhyas tasyaiṣa ātmā vivṛṇute tanūṃ svām” iti // BhGR_11.53,54 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3996: nirvairas sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ sa mām eti pāṇḍava // BhG_11.55 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:3997: vedādhyayanādīni sarvāṇi karmāṇi madārādhanarūpāṇīti yaḥ karoti,
GSP33ramgbhpu:3999: matparamaḥ sarveṣām ārambhāṇām aham eva paramoddeśyo yasya,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4001: madbhaktaḥ atyarthamatpriyatvena matkīrtanastutidhyānārcanapraṇāmādibhir vinā ātmadhāraṇam alabhamāno madekaprayojanatayā yaḥ satataṃ tāni karoti,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4005: ca sarvabhūtānāṃ paramapuruṣaparatantratvānusaṃdhānāc ca sarvabhūteṣu vairanimittābhāvāt teṣu nirvairaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4007: sa mām iti māṃ yathāvad avasthitaṃ prāpnoti;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4010: bhaktiyoganiṣṭhānāṃ prāpyabhūtasya parasya brahmaṇo bhagavato nārāyaṇasya niraṅkuśāiśvaryaṃ
GSP33ramgbhpu:4014: ananataram ātmaprāptisādhanabhūtād atmopāsanād bhaktirūpasya bhagavadupāsanasya svasādhyaniṣpādane śaighryāt susukhopādānatvāc ca śraiṣṭhyam,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4020: śraddhāvān bhajate yo mām sa me yuktatamo mataḥ //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4022: evaṃ satatayuktā ye bhaktās tvāṃ paryupāsate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4023: ye cāpy akṣaram avyaktaṃ teṣāṃ ke yogavittamāḥ // BhG_12.1 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4025: satatayuktāḥ bhagavantaṃ tvām eva paraṃ prāpyaṃ manvānāḥ ye bhaktāḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4027: ye cāpy akṣaraṃ pratyagātmasvarūpam tad eva ca avyaktaṃ cakṣurādikaraṇānabhivyaktasvarūpam upāsate;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4028: teṣām ubhayeṣāṃ ke yogavittamāḥ ke svasādhyaṃ prati śīghragāmina ityarthaḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4029: “bhavāmi na cirāt pārtha” iti uttaratra yogavittamatvaṃ śaighryaviṣayam iti hi vyañjayiṣyate // BhGR_12.1 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4031: mayy āveśya mano ye māṃ nityayuktā upāsate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4032: śraddhayā parayopetās te me yuktatamāḥ matāḥ // BhG_12.2 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4033: atyarthamatpriyatvena mano mayy āveśya śraddhayā parayopetāḥ nityayuktāḥ nityayogaṃ
GSP33ramgbhpu:4034: kāṅkṣamāṇāḥ ye mām upāsate prāpyaviṣayaṃ mano mayy āveśya ye mām upāsata ityarthaḥ
GSP33ramgbhpu:4035: te yuktatamāḥ māṃ sukhenācirāt prāpnuvantītyarthaḥ // BhGR_12.2 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4036: ye tv akṣaram anirdeśyam avyaktaṃ paryupāsate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4037: sarvatragam acintyaṃ ca kūṭastham acalaṃ dhruvam // BhG_12.3 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4039: te prāpnuvanti mām eva sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ // BhG_12.4 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4041: avyaktā hi gatir duḥkhaṃ dehavadbhir avāpyate // BhG_12.5 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4043: anirdeśyam dehād anyatayā devādiśabdānirdeśyam tata eva cakṣurādikaraṇānabhivyaktam,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4044: sarvatragam acintyaṃ ca sarvatra devādideheṣu vartamānam api tadvisajātīyatayā tena tena rūpeṇa cintayitum anarham,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4045: tata eva kūṭastham sarvasādhāraṇam tat tad devādyasādhāraṇākārāsaṃbaddham ityarthaḥ apariṇāmitvena svāsādhāraṇākārān na calati na cyavata ity
GSP33ramgbhpu:4047: sanniyāmyendriyagrāmam cakṣurādikam indriyagrāmaṃ sarvaṃ svavyāpārebhyas samyaṅniyamya,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4048: sarvatra samabuddhayaḥ sarvatra devādiviṣamākāreṣu deheṣv avasthiteṣv ātmasu jñānaikākāratayā samabuddhayaḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4049: tata eva sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ sarvabhūtāhitarahitatvān nivṛttāḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4052: te 'pi māṃ prāpnuvanty eva matsamānākāram asaṃsāriṇam ātmānaṃ prāpnuvanty evetyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4054: śrūyate ca, “nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyam upaiti” iti /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4055: tathā akṣaraśabdanirdiṣṭāt kūṭasthād anyatvaṃ parasya brahmaṇo vakṣyate,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4058: “atha parā yayā tad akṣaram adhikgamyate” ity akṣaravidyāyāṃ tu akṣaraśabdanirdiṣṭaṃ param eva brahma,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4061: avyaktā hi gatiḥ avyaktaviṣayā manovṛttiḥ dehavadbhiḥ dehātmābhimānayuktaiḥ duḥkhenāvāpyate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4062: dehavanto hi deham eva ātmānaṃ manyante // BhGR_12.3,4,5 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4064: ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya matparāḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4065: ananyenaiva yogena māṃ dhyāyanta upāsate // BhG_12.6 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4067: bhavāmi na cirāt pārtha mayy āveśitacetasām // BhG_12.7 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4070: vaidikāni ca yagadānahomatapaḥprabhṛtīni sarvāṇi sakāraṇāni soddeśyāni adhyātmacetasā mayi saṃnyasya,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4072: ananyenaiva yogena ananyaprayojanena yogena māṃ dhyāyanta upāsate dhyānārcanapraṇāmastutikīrtanādīni svayam evātyarthapriyāṇi prāpyasamāni kurvanto mām upāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4073: teṣāṃ matprāptivirodhitayā mṛtyubhūtāt saṃsārākhyāt sāgarād aham acireṇaiva kālena samuddhartā bhavāmi // BhGR_12.6,7 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4074: mayy eva mana ādhatsva mayi buddhiṃ niveśaya /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4075: nivasiṣyasi mayy eva ata ūrdhvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // BhG_12.8 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4076: ato 'tiśayitapuruṣārthatvāt sulabhatvād aciralabhyatvāc ca mayy eva mana ādhatsva mayi manassamādhānaṃ kuru /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4077: mayi buddhiṃ niveśaya aham eva paramaprāpya ity adhyavasāyaṃ kuru /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4079: aham eva paramaprāpya ity adhyavasāyapūrvakamanoniveśanānantaram eva mayi nivasiṣyasītyarthaḥ // BhGR_12.8 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4080: atha cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4081: abhyāsayogena tato mām icchāptuṃ dhanañjaya // BhG_12.9 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4082: atha sahasaiva mayi sthiraṃ cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4088: madartham api karmāṇi kurvan siddhim avāpsyasi // BhG_12.10 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4093: atyarthapriyatvena madarthaṃ karmāṇi kurvann api acirād abhyāsayogapūrvikāṃ mayi sthirāṃ cittasthitiṃ labdhvā matprāptirūpāṃ siddhim avāpsyasi
GSP33ramgbhpu:4094: athaitad apy aśakto 'si kartuṃ madyogam āśritaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4096: atha madyogam āśrityaitad api kartuṃ na śaknoṣi madguṇānusandhānakṛtamadekapriyatvākāraṃ bhaktiyogam āśritya bhaktiyogāṅkurarūpam etan matkarmāpi kartuṃ na śaknoṣi,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4097: tato 'kṣarayogam ātmasvabhāvānusandhānarūpaṃ parabhaktijananaṃ pūrvaṣaṭkoditam āśritya tadupāyatayā sarvakarmaphalatyāgaṃ kuru /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4101: nivṛttāvidyādisarvatirodhāne maccheṣataikasvarūpe pratyagātmani sākṣātkṛte sati mayi
GSP33ramgbhpu:4104: “svakarmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhiṃ vindati mānavaḥ” ity ārabhya,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4106: brahmabhūtaḥ prasannātmā na śocati na kāṅkṣati /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4107: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu madbhaktiṃ labhate parām” iti // BhGR_12.11 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4108: śreyo hi jñānam abhyāsāj jñānād dhyānaṃ viśiṣyate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4109: dhyānāt karmaphalatyāgaḥ tyāgāc chāntir anantaram // BhG_12.12 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4110: atyarthaprītivirahitāt karkaśarūpāt smṛtyabhyāsād akṣarayāthātmyānusandhānapūrvakaṃ tadāparokṣyajñānam eva ātmahitatvena viśiṣyate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4111: ātmāparokṣyajñānād apy aniṣpannarūpāt tadupāyabhūtātmadhyānam evātmahitatve viśiṣyate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4112: taddhyānād apy aniṣpannarūpāt tadupāyabhūtaṃ phalatyāgenānuṣṭhitaṃ karmaiva viśiṣyate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4113: anabhisaṃhitaphalād anuṣṭhitāt karmaṇo 'nantaram eva nirastapāpatayā manasaś śāntir bhaviṣyati;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4116: tadāparokṣyāt parā bhaktiḥ iti bhaktiyogābhyāsāśaktasyātmaniṣṭhaiva śreyasī /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4119: adveṣṭā sarvabhūtānāṃ maitraḥ karuṇa eva ca /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4122: mayy arpitamanobuddhir yo madbhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ // BhG_12.14 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4123: adveṣṭā sarvabhūtānām vidviṣatām apakurvatām api sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām adveṣṭā madaparādhānuguṇam īśvarapreritāny etāni bhūtāni dviṣanty apakurvanti cety anusandadhānaḥ;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4124: teṣu dviṣatsu apkurvatsu ca sarvabhūteṣu maitrīṃ matiṃ kurvan maitraḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4125: teṣv eva duḥkhiteṣu karuṇāṃ kurvan karuṇaḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4128: tata eva samaduḥkhasukhaḥ sukhaduḥkhāgamayoḥ sāṅkalpikayoḥ harṣodvegarahitaḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4129: kṣamī sparśaprabhavayor avarjanīyayor api tayor vikārarahitaḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4130: saṃtuṣṭaḥ yadṛcchopanatena yena kenāpi dehadhāraṇadravyeṇa saṃtuṣṭaḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4134: mayy arpitamanobuddhiḥ bhagavān vāsedeva evānabhisaṃhitaphalenānuṣṭhitena karmaṇā ārādhyate,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4135: ārādhitaś ca mama ātmāparokṣyaṃ sādhayiṣyatīti mayy arpitamanobuddhiḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4136: ya evaṃbhūto madbhaktaḥ evaṃ karmayogena māṃ bhajamāno yaḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4138: yasmān nodvijate loko lokān nodvijate ca yaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4139: harṣāmarṣabhayodvegair mukto yaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ // BhG_12.15 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4140: yasmāt karmaniṣṭhāt puruṣān nimittabhūtāl loko nodvijate yo lokodvegakaraṃ karma kiñcid api na karotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4141: lokāc ca nimittabhūtād yo nodvijate yam uddiśya sarvaloko nodvegakaraṃ karma karoti;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4150: sarvārambhaparityāgī yo madbhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ // BhG_12.16 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4159: yo na hṛṣyati na dveṣṭi na śocati na kāṅkṣati /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4160: śubhāśubhaparityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ // BhG_12.17 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4161: yo na hṛṣyati yan manuṣyāṇāṃ harṣanimittaṃ priyajātam,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4162: tat prāpya yaḥ karmayogī na hṛṣyati;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4171: samaś śatrau ca mitre ca tathā mānāvamānayoḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4174: aniketaḥ sthiramatir bhaktimān me priyo naraḥ // BhG_12.19 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4176: atra teṣu sannihiteṣv api samacittatvaṃ tato 'py atirikto viśeṣa ucyate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4177: ātmani sthiramatitvena niketanādiṣv asakta ity aniketaḥ;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4181: asmād ātmaniṣṭhād bhaktiyoganiṣṭhasya śraiṣṭhyaṃ pratipādayan yathopakramam upasaṃharati
GSP33ramgbhpu:4182: ye tu dharmyāmṛtam idaṃ yathoktaṃ paryupāsate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4183: śraddadhānā matparamā bhaktās te 'tīva me priyāḥ // BhG_12.20 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4186: yathoktam “mayy āveśya mano ye mām“ityādinoktena prakāreṇa upāsate;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4187: te bhaktāḥ atitarāṃ mama priyāḥ // BhGR_12.20 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4189: pūrvasmin ṣaṭke paramaprāpyasya parasya brahmaṇo bhagavato vāsudevasya prāptyupāyabhūtabhaktirūpabhagavadupāsanāṅgabhūtaṃ
GSP33ramgbhpu:4192: atiśayitāiśvaryāpekṣāṇām ātmakaivalyamātrāpekṣāṇāṃ ca bhaktiyogas tattadapekṣitasādhanam iti coktam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4193: idānīm uparitane ṣaṭke prakṛtipuruṣatatsaṃsargarūpaprapañceśvaratadyāthātmyakarmajñānabhaktisvarūpatadupādānaprakārāś ca ṣaṭkadvayoditā viśodhyante
GSP33ramgbhpu:4201: idaṃ śarīraṃ kaunteya kṣetram ity abhidhīyate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4202: etad yo vetti taṃ prāhuḥ kṣetrajña iti tadvidaḥ // BhG_13.1 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4206: kṛśo 'ham iti ātmano bhoktrā saha sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratīyamānaṃ bhoktur ātmano 'rthāntarabhūtasya bhogakṣetram iti śarīrayāthātmyavidbhir abhidhīyate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4212: manuṣyo 'haṃ ghaṭādikaṃ jānāmi” iti dehasāmānādhikaraṇyena jñātāram ātmānam anusandhatte,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4213: tathāpi dehānubhavavelāyāṃ deham api ghaṭādikam iva “idam ahaṃ vedmi” iti vedyatayā veditānubhavatīti veditur ātmano vedyatayā śarīram api ghaṭādivad arthāntarabhūtam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4214: tathā ghaṭāder iva vedyabhūtāc charīrād api veditā kṣetrajño 'rthāntarabhūtaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4215: sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratītis tu vastutaś śarīrasya gotvādivad atmaviśeṣaṇataikasvabhāvatayā tadapṛthaksiddher upapannā /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4216: tatra veditur asādhāraṇākārasya cakṣurādikaraṇāviṣayatvād yogasaṃskṛtamanoviṣayatvāc ca prakṛtisannidhānād eva mūḍhāḥ prakṛtyākāram eva veditāraṃ
GSP33ramgbhpu:4219: vimūḍhā nānupaśyanti paśyanti jñānacakṣuṣaḥ” iti // BhGR_13.1 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4220: kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sarvakṣetreṣu bhārata /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4221: kṣetrakṣetrajñayor jñānaṃ yat taj jñānaṃ mataṃ mama // BhG_13.2 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4222: devamanuṣyādisarvakṣetreṣu veditṛtvākāraṃ kṣetrajñaṃ ca māṃ viddhi madātmakaṃ viddhi;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4223: kṣetrajñaṃ cāpīti apiśabdāt kṣetram api māṃ viddhīty uktam iti gamyate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4224: yathā kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñaviśeṣaṇataikasvabhāvatayā tadapṛthaksiddheḥ tatsāmānādhikaraṇyenaiva nirdeśyam,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4225: tathā kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñaṃ ca madviśeṣaṇataikasvabhāvatayā madapṛthaksiddheḥ matsāmānādhikaraṇyenaiva nirdeśyau viddhi /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4226: pṛthivyādisaṃghātarūpasya kṣetrasya kṣetrajñasya ca bhagavaccharīrataikasvarūpatayā bhagavadātmakatvaṃ śrutayo vadanti,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4227: “yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan pṛthivyā antaro yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīm antaro yamayati sa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ” ity
GSP33ramgbhpu:4228: “ya ātmani tiṣṭhan ātmano 'ntaro yam ātmā na veda yasyātmā śarīraṃ ya ātmānam antaro yamayati sa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ” ity ādyāḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4229: idam evāntaryāmitayā sarvakṣetrajñānām ātmatvenāvasthānaṃ bhagavataḥ tatsāmānādhikaraṇyena vyapadeśahetuḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4231: “na tad asti vinā yat syān mayā bhūtaṃ carācaram” ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4232: “viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat” iti purastād upariṣṭāc cābhidhāya,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4235: yad idaṃ kṣetrakṣetrajñayoḥ vivekaviṣayaṃ tayor madātmakatvaviṣayaṃ ca jñānam uktam,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4236: tad evopādeyaṃ jñānam iti mama matam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4237: kecid āhuḥ “kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi” iti sāmānādhikaraṇyenaikatvam avagamyate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4238: tataś ceśvarasyaiva sato 'jñānāt kṣetrajñatvam iva bhavatīty abhyupagantavyam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4241: “rajjur eṣā na sarpaḥ” ity āptopadeśena sarpatvabhramanivṛttivat kṣetrajñatvabhramo nivartate iti /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4242: te praṣṭavyāḥ ayam upadeṣṭā bhagavān vāsudevaḥ parameśvaraḥ kim ātmayāthātmyasākṣātkāreṇa nivṛttājñānaḥ uta neti /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4245: tān praty upadeśādivyāpārāś ca na saṃbhavanti /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4248: “upadekṣyanti te jñānaṃ jñāninas tattvadarśinaḥ” iti hy uktam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4249: ata evam ādivādā anākalitaśrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇanyāyasvavāgvirodhair ajñānibhir jaganmohanāya pravartitā ity anādaraṇīyāḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4251: acidvastunaś cidvastunaḥ parasya ca brahmaṇo bhogyatvena bhoktṛtvena ceśitṛtvena ca svarūpavivekam āhuḥ kāścana śrutayaḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4252: “asmān māyī sṛjate viśvam etat tasmiṃś cānyo māyayā sanniruddhaḥ“,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4253: “māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyān māyinaṃ tu maheśvaraṃ“,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4254: “kṣaraṃ pradhānam amṛtākṣaraṃ haraḥ kṣarātmānāv īśate deva ekaḥ” amṛtākṣaraṃ haraḥ iti bhoktā nirdiśyate;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4255: pradhānam ātmano bhogyatvena haratīti haraḥ “sa kāraṇaṃ karaṇādhipādhipo na cāsya kaściñ janitā na cādhipaḥ“,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4259: “nityo nityānāṃ cetanaś cetanānām eko bahūnāṃ yo vidadhāti kāmān“,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4261: “pṛthagātmānaṃ preritāraṃ ca matvā juṣṭas tatas tenāmṛtatvam eti“,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4262: “tayor anyaḥ pippalaṃ svādv atty anaśnann anyo 'bhicākaśīti“,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4263: “ajām ekāṃ lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāṃ bahvīṃ prajāṃ janayantīṃ sarūpām /

GSP33ramgbhpu:4541: bhūtabhartṛ ca taj jñeyaṃ grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca // BhG_13.16 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4542: devamanuṣyādibhūteṣu sarvatra sthitam ātmavastu veditṛtvaikākāratayā avibhaktam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4543: aviduṣāṃ devādyākāreṇa “ayaṃ devo manuṣyaḥ” iti vibhaktam iva ca sthitam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4544: devo 'ham, manuṣyo 'ham iti dehasāmānādhikaraṇyenānusandhīyamānam api veditṛtvena dehād arthāntarabhūtaṃ jñātuṃ śakyam iti ādāv uktam eva,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4546: idānīṃ prakārāntaraiś ca jñātuṃ śakyam ity āja bhūtabhartṛ ceti /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4547: bhūtānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ deharūpeṇa saṃhatānāṃ yad bhartṛ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4551: grasyamānebhyo bhūtebhyo grasitṛtvenārthāntrabhūtam iti jñātuṃ śakyam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4555: mṛtaśarīre grasanaprabhavādīnām adarśanān na bhūtasaṃghātarūpaṃ kṣetraṃ grasanaprabhavabharaṇahetur iti niścīyate // BhGR_13.16 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4556: jyotiṣām api taj jyotis tamasaḥ param ucyate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4557: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānagamyaṃ hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam // BhG_13.17 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4558: jyotiśām dīpādityamaṇiprabhṛtīnām api tad eva jyotiḥ prakāśakam,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4566: ato jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānaikākāram iti jñeyam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4567: tac ca jñānagamyam amānitvādibhir jñānasādhanair uktaiḥ prāpyam ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4568: hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam sarvasya manuṣyādeḥ hṛdi viśeṣaṇāvasthitam sannihitam // BhGR_13.17 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4569: iti kṣetraṃ tathā jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ coktaṃ samāsataḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4571: evaṃ “mahābhūtāny ahaṅkāraḥ” ityādinā “saṃghātaś cetanādhṛtir” ityantena kṣetratattvaṃ samāsenoktam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4573: “anādi matparam” ityādinā “hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam” ityantena jñeyasya kṣetrajñasya yāthātmyaṃ ca saṃkṣepeṇoktam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4579: athātyantaviviktasvabhāvayoḥ prakṛtyātmanoḥ saṃsargasyānāditvaṃ saṃsṛṣṭayor dvayoḥ kāryabhedaḥ saṃsargahetuś cocyate
GSP33ramgbhpu:4580: prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva viddhy anādī ubhāv api /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4581: vikārāṃś ca guṇāṃś caiva viddhi prakṛtisaṃbhavān // BhG_13.19 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4582: prakṛtipuruṣau ubhau anyonyasaṃsṛṣṭau anādī iti viddhi;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4584: amānitvādikāṃś ca guṇām mokṣahetubhūtān prakṛtisaṃbhavān viddhi /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4585: puruṣeṇa saṃsṛṣṭeyam anādikālapravṛttā kṣetrākārapariṇātā prakṛtiḥ svavikārair icchādveṣādibhiḥ puruṣasya bandhuhetur bhavati;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4588: puruṣaḥ sukhaduḥkhānāṃ bhoktṛtve hetur ucyate // BhG_13.20 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4591: teṣāṃ kriyākāritve puruṣādhiṣṭhitā prakṛtir eva hetuḥ;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4601: puruṣaḥ prakṛtistho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇān /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4610: tatas tatpuṇyapāpaphalānubhavāya sadasadyoniṣu sādhvasādhuṣu yoniṣu jāyate;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4615: tad idam uktaṃ kāraṇaṃ guṇasaṅgo 'sya sadasadyonijanmasu iti // BhGR_13.21 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4617: paramātmeti cāpy ukto dehe 'smin puruṣaḥ paraḥ // BhG_13.22 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4618: asmin dehe 'vasthito 'yaṃ puruṣo dehapravṛttyanuguṇasaṅkalpādirūpeṇa dehasyopadraṣṭā anumantā ca bhavati /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4623: dehaśeṣitvena ca dehendriyamanāṃsi prati maheśvaro bhavati /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4628: asmin dehe dehendriyamanāṃsi prati paramātmeti cāpy uktaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4629: dehe manasi ca ātmaśabdo 'nantaram eva prayujyate,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4631: apiśabdān maheśvara ity apy ukta iti gamyate;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4632: puruṣaḥ paraḥ “anādi matparam” ityādinokto 'paricchinnajñānaśaktir ayaṃ puruṣo 'nādiprakṛtisaṃbandhakṛtaguṇasaṅgād
GSP33ramgbhpu:4633: etad dehamātramaheśvaro dehamātraparamātmā ca bhavati // BhGR_13.22 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4634: ya enaṃ vetti puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṃ ca guṇais saha /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4635: sarvathā vartamāno 'pi na sa bhūyo 'bhijāyate // BhG_13.23 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4637: uktasvabhāvāṃ ca prakṛtiṃ vakṣyamāṇasvabhāvayuktaiḥ sattvādibhir guṇaiḥ saha,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4640: na bhūyo 'bhijāyate na bhūyaḥ prakṛtyā saṃsargam arhati,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4641: aparicchinnajñānalakaṣaṇam apahatapāpmānam ātmānaṃ taddehāvasānasamaye prāpnotītyarthaḥ // BhGR_13.23 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4643: anye sāṅkhyena yogena karmayogena cāpare // BhG_13.24 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4644: kecin niṣpannayogāḥ ātmani śarīre 'vasthitam ātmānam ātmanā manasā dhyānena yogena paśyanti /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4646: sāṃkhyena yogena jñānayogena yogayogyaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā ātmānaṃ paśyanti /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4649: vyapadeśyāś ca karmayogenāntargatajñānena manaso yogayogyatām āpādya ātmānaṃ paśyanti // BhGR_13.24 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4650: anye tv evam ajānantaḥ śrutvānyebhyaś ca upāsate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4651: te 'pi cātitaranty eva mṛtyuṃ śrutiparāyaṇāḥ // BhG_13.25 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4652: anye tu karmayogādiṣu ātmāvalokanasādhaneṣv anadhikṛtāḥ anyebhyaḥ tattvadarśibhyo jñānibhyaḥ śrutvā karmayogādibhir ātmānam upāsate;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4655: ete ca śravaṇaniṣṭhāḥ pūtapāpāḥ krameṇa karmayogādikam ārabhyātitaranty eva mṛtyum /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4657: atha prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭasyātmano vivekānusandhānaprakāraṃ vaktuṃ sarvaṃ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca sattvaṃ cidacitsaṃsargajam ity āha
GSP33ramgbhpu:4661: tāvat kṣetrakṣetrajñayor itaretarasaṃyogād eva jāyate saṃyuktam eva jāyate,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4664: vinaśyatsv avinaśyantaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // BhG_13.27 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4665: evam itaretarayukteṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu devādiviṣamākārād viyuktaṃ tatra tatra tattaddehendriyamanāṃsi
GSP33ramgbhpu:4666: prati parameśvaratvena sthitam ātmānaṃ jñātṛtvena samānākāraṃ teṣu dehādiṣu vinaśyatsu
GSP33ramgbhpu:4668: sa paśyati sa ātmānaṃ yathāvad avasthitaṃ paśyati /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4669: yas tu devādiviṣamākāreṇātmānam api viṣamākāraṃ janmavināśādiyuktaṃ ca paśyati,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4671: samaṃ paśyan hi sarvatra samavasthitam īśvaram /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4672: na hinasty ātmanātmānaṃ tato yāti parāṃ gatim // BhG_13.28 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4673: sarvatra devādiśarīreṣu tattaccheṣitvenādhāratayā viyantṛtayā ca sthitam īśvaram ātmānaṃ devādiviṣamākāraviyuktaṃ jñānaikākāratayā samaṃ paśyan ātmanā manasā,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4676: tataḥ tasmāj jñātṛtayā sarvatra samānākāradarśanāt parāṃ gatiṃ yāti;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4678: paraṃ gantavyaṃ yathāvad avasthitam ātmānaṃ prāpnoti;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4679: devādyākārayuktatayā sarvatra viṣamam ātmānaṃ paśyan ātmānaṃ hinasti bhavajaladhimadhye prakṣipati // BhGR_13.28 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4681: yaḥ paśyati tathātmānam akartāraṃ sa paśyati // BhG_13.29 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4683: “kāryakāraṇakartṛtve hetuḥ prakṛtir ucyate” iti pūrvoktarītyā prakṛtyā kriyamāṇānīti yaḥ paśyati,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4684: tathā ātmānaṃ jñānākāraṃ akartāraṃ ca yaḥ paśyati,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4685: tasya prakṛtisaṃyogas tadadhiṣṭhānaṃ tajjanyasukhaduḥkhānubhavaś ca karmarūpājñānakṛtānīti ca yaḥ paśyati,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4686: sa ātmānaṃ yathāvad avasthitaṃ paśyati // BhGR_13.29 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4688: tata eva ca vistāraṃ brahma saṃpadyate tadā // BhG_13.30 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4689: prakṛtipuruṣatattvadvayātmakeṣu devādiṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu satsu teṣāṃ devatvamanuṣyatvahrasvatvadīrghatvādipṛthagbhāvam ekastham ekatattvastham prakṛtisthaṃ yadā paśyati,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4691: tata eva prakṛtita evottarottaraputrapautrādibhedavistāraṃ ca yadā paśyati,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4692: tadaiva brahmasaṃpadyate anavacchinnaṃ jñānaikākāram ātmānaṃ prāpnotītyarthaḥ // BhGR_13.30 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4694: śarīrastho 'pi kaunteya na karoti na lipyate // BhG_13.31 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4695: ayaṃ paramātmā dehān niṣkṛṣya svasvabhāvena nirūpitaḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4698: na lipyate dehasvabhāvair na lipyate // BhGR_13.31 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4700: nityasaṃyukto dehasvabhāvaiḥ kathaṃ na lipyata ity atrāha
GSP33ramgbhpu:4703: yathā ākāśaṃ sarvagatam api sarvair vastubhis saṃyuktam api saukṣmyāt sarvavastusvabhāvair na lipyate,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4704: tathā ātmā atisaukṣmyāt sarvatra devamanuṣyādau dehe 'vasthito 'pi tattaddehasvabhāvair na lipyate // BhGR_13.32 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4705: yathā prakāśayaty ekaḥ kṛtsnaṃ lokam imaṃ raviḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4706: kṣetraṃ kṣetrī tathā kṛtsnaṃ prakāśayati bhārata // BhG_13.33 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4707: yathaika ādityaḥ svayā prabhayā kṛtsnam imaṃ lokaṃ prakāśayati,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4709: “mamedaṃ kṣetram īdṛśam” iti kṛtsnam bahirantaś cāpādatalamastakaṃ svakīyena jñānena prakāśayati /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4710: ataḥ prakāśyāl lokāt prakāśakādityavad veditṛtvena vedyabhūtād asmāt kṣetrād atyantavilakṣaṇo 'yam uktalakṣaṇa ātmetyarthaḥ // BhGR_13.33 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4712: bhūtaprakṛtimokṣaṃ ca ye vidur yānti te param // BhG_13.34 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4713: evam uktena prakāreṇa kṣetrakṣetrajñayor antaraṃ viśeṣaṃ vivekaviṣayajñānākhyena cakṣuṣā ye viduḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4715: te paraṃ yānti nirmuktabandham ātmānaṃ prāpnuvanti /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4718: kṣetrakṣetrajñayor vivekaviṣayeṇoktena jñānena tayor vivekaṃ viditvā bhūtākārapariṇataprakṛtimokṣopāyam amānitvādikaṃ cāgamya ya ācaranti,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4719: te nirmuktabandhāḥ svena rūpeṇāvasthitam anavacchinnajñānalakṣaṇam ātmānaṃ prāpnuvantītyarthaḥ // BhGR_13.34 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4721: trayodaśe prakṛtipuruṣayor anyānyasaṃsṛṣṭayoḥ svarūpayāthātmayaṃ vijñāya amānitvādibhiḥ bhagavadbhaktyanugṛhītair bandhān mucyata ity uktam
GSP33ramgbhpu:4727: paraṃ bhūyaḥ pravakṣyāmi jñānānāṃ jñānam uttamam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4728: yaj jñātvā munayaḥ sarve parāṃ siddhim ito gatāḥ // BhG_14.1 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4729: param pūrvoktād anyat prakṛtipuruṣāntargatam eva sattvādiguṇaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ bhūyaḥ pravakṣyāmi /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4730: tac ca jñānaṃ sarveṣāṃ prakṛtipuruṣaviṣayajñānānām uttamam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4731: yaj jñānaṃ jñātvā sarve munayas tan mananaśīlāḥ itaḥ saṃsārabandhāt parāṃ siddhiṃ gatāḥ parāṃ pariśuddhātmasvarūpaprāptirūpāṃ siddhim avāptāḥ
GSP33ramgbhpu:4732: punar api taj jñānaṃ phalena viśinaṣṭi
GSP33ramgbhpu:4733: idaṃ jñānam upāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4734: sarge 'pi nopajāyante pralaye na vyathanti ca // BhG_14.2 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4735: idam vakṣyamāṇaṃ jñānam upaśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ matsāmyaṃ prāptāḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4737: pralaye na vyathanti ca na ca saṃhṛtikarmatām // BhGR_14.2 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4738: atha prākṛtānāṃ guṇānāṃ bandhahetutāprakāraṃ vaktuṃ sarvasya bhūtajātasya prakṛtipuruṣasaṃsargajatvaṃ “yāvat saṃjāyate kiñcit” ity anenoktaṃ bhagavatā svenaiva kṛtam ity āha
GSP33ramgbhpu:4739: mama yonir mahadbrahma tasmin garbhaṃ dadhāmy aham /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4740: saṃbhavas sarvabhūtānāṃ tato bhavati bhārata // BhG_14.3 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4741: kṛtsnasya jagato yonibhūtaṃ mama mahadbrahma yat,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4743: “bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4744: ahaṅkāra itīyaṃ me bhinnā prakṛtir aṣṭadhā //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4745: apareyam” iti nirdiṣṭā acetanaprakṛtiḥ mahadahaṅkārādivikārāṇāṃ kāraṇatayā mahadbrahmety ucyate /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4746: śrutāv api kvacit prakṛtir api brahmeti nirdiśyate,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4748: tasmād etad brahma nāma rūpam annaṃ ca jāyate” iti;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4749: “itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4750: jīvabhūtām” iti cetanapuñjarūpā yā parā prakṛtir nirdiṣṭā,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4752: tasmin acetane yonibhūte mahati brahmaṇi cetanapuñjarūpaṃ garbhaṃ dadhāmi;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4754: tataḥ tasmāt prakṛtidvayasaṃyogān matsaṃkalpakṛtāt sarvabhūtānāṃ brahmādistambaparyantānāṃ saṃbhavo bhavati // BhGR_14.3 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4755: kāryāvastho 'pi cidacitprakṛtisaṃsargo mayaiva kṛta ity āha
GSP33ramgbhpu:4757: tāsāṃ brahma mahad yonir ahaṃ bījapradaḥ pitā // BhG_14.4 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4758: sarvāsu devagandharvayakṣarākṣasamanuṣyapaśumṛgapakṣisarīsṛpādiṣu yoniṣu tattanmūrtayo yāḥ saṃbhavanti jāyante,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4760: mayā saṃyojitacetanavargā mahadādiviśeṣāntāvasthā prakṛtiḥ kāraṇam ityarthaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4761: ahaṃ bījapradaḥ pitā tatra tatra ca tattatkarmānuguṇyena cetanavargasya saṃyojakaś cāham ityarthaḥ // BhGR_14.4 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4762: evaṃ sargādau prācīnakarmavaśād acitsaṃsargeṇa devādiyoniṣu jātānāṃ punaḥ punar devādibhāvena janmahetum āha
GSP33ramgbhpu:4763: sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇāḥ prakṛtisaṃbhavāḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4764: nibadhnanti mahābāho dehe dehinam avyayam // BhG_14.5 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4765: sattvarajastamāṃsi trayo guṇāḥ prakṛteḥ svarūpānubandhinaḥ svabhāvaviśeṣāḥ prakāśādikāryaikanirūpaṇīyāḥ
GSP33ramgbhpu:4766: prakṛtyavasthāyām anudbhūtāḥ tadvikāreṣu mahadādiṣu udbhūtāḥ mahadādiviśeṣāntair
GSP33ramgbhpu:4768: avyayam svato guṇasaṃbandhānarhaṃ dehe vartamānaṃ nibadhnanti,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4773: tatra sattvarajastamas tu sattvasya svarūpam īdṛśam nirmalatvāt prakāśakam;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4777: anāmayam āmayākhyaṃ kāryaṃ na vidyata ity anāmayam;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4779: eṣa sattvākhyo guṇo dehinam enaṃ sukhasaṅgena jñānasaṅgena ca badhnāti puruṣasya sukhasaṅgaṃ jñānasaṅgaṃ ca janayatītyarthaḥ/
GSP33ramgbhpu:4780: jñānasukhayos saṅge hi jāte tatsādhaneṣu laukikavaidikeṣu pravartate;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4781: tataś ca tatphalānubhavasādhanabhūtāsu yoniṣu jāyata iti sattvaṃ sukhajñānasaṅgadvāreṇa puruṣaṃ badhnāti /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4782: jñānasukhajananaṃ punar api tayos saṅgajananaṃ ca sattvam ity uktaṃ bhavati // BhGR_14.6 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4784: tan nibadhnāti kaunteya karmasaṅgena dehinam // BhG_14.7 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4790: tad rajaḥ dehinaṃ karmasu kriyāsu spṛhājananadvāreṇa nibadhnāti;
GSP33ramgbhpu:4791: kriyāsu hi spṛhayā yāḥ kriyā ārabhate dehī,
GSP33ramgbhpu:4792: tāś ca puṇyapāparūpā iti tatphalānubhavasādhanabhūtāsu yoniṣu janmahetavo bhavanti /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4794: tad evaṃ rajo rāgatṛṣṇāsaṅgahetuḥ karmasaṅgahetuś cety uktaṃ bhavati // BhGR_14.7 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4795: tamas tv ajñānajaṃ viddhi mohanaṃ sarvadehinām /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4804: tat tamaḥ pramādālasyanidrāhetutayā taddvāreṇa dehinaṃ nibadhnāti /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4812: sattvaṃ sukhe sañjayati rajaḥ karmaṇi bhārata /
GSP33ramgbhpu:4813: jñānam āvṛtya tu tamaḥ pramāde sañjayaty uta // BhG_14.9 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4816: tamas tu vastuyāthātmyajñānam āvṛtya viparītajñānahetutayā kartavyaviparītapravṛttisaṅgapradhānam // BhGR_14.9 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:4818: te ca svarūpānubandhitvena sarvadā sarve vartante iti parasparaviruddhaṃ kāryaṃ kathaṃ janayantīty atra āha

GSP33ramgbhpu:6366: anantāṃs tvayā parimitakālavartinā dūranuṣṭhānān sarvān dharmān parityajya bhaktiyogārambhasiddhaye
GSP33ramgbhpu:6367: mām ekaṃ paramakāruṇikam anālocitaviśeṣāśeṣalokaśaraṇyam āśritavātsalyajaladhiṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadyasva /
GSP33ramgbhpu:6368: ahaṃ tvā sarvapāpebhyaḥ yathoditasvarūpabhaktyārambhavirodhibhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pāpebhyaḥ mokṣayiṣyāmi; mā śucaḥ // BhGR_18.66 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:6370: na cāśuśrūṣave vācyaṃ na ca māṃ yo 'bhyasūyati // BhGR_18.67 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:6371: idaṃ te paramaṃ guhyaṃ śāstraṃ mayākhyātam atapaskāya ataptatapase tvayā na vācyam;
GSP33ramgbhpu:6378: matsvarūpe madaiśvarye madguṇeṣu ca kathiteṣu yo doṣam āviṣkaroti,
GSP33ramgbhpu:6381: ya idaṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ madbhakteṣv abhidhāsyati /
GSP33ramgbhpu:6382: bhaktiṃ mayi parāṃ kṛtvā mām evaiṣyaty asaṃśayaḥ // BhGR_18.68 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:6383: idaṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ madbhakteṣu yaḥ abhidhāsyati vyākhyāsyati,
GSP33ramgbhpu:6384: saḥ mayi paramāṃ bhaktiṃ kṛtvā mām evaiṣyati;
GSP33ramgbhpu:6386: na ca tasmān manuṣyeṣu kaścin me priyakṛttamaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:6387: bhavitā na ca me tasmād anyaḥ priyataro bhuvi // BhGR_18.69 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:6388: sarveṣu manuṣyeṣv itaḥ pūrvaṃ tasmād anyo manuṣyo me na kaścit priyakṛttamo 'bhūt;
GSP33ramgbhpu:6390: ayogyānāṃ prathamam upādānaṃ yogyānām akathanād api tatkathanasyāniṣṭatamatvāt //
GSP33ramgbhpu:6391: adhyeṣyate ca ya imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃvādam āvayoḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:6392: jñānayajñena tenāham iṣṭaḥ syām iti me matiḥ // BhGR_18.70 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:6393: ya imam āvayor dharmyaṃ saṃvādam adhyeṣyate,
GSP33ramgbhpu:6394: tena jñānayajñenāham iṣṭas syām iti me matiḥ asmin yo jñānayajño 'bhidhīyate,
GSP33ramgbhpu:6395: tenāham etad adhyayanamātreṇeṣṭaḥ syām ityarthaḥ // BhGR_18.70 /
GSP33ramgbhpu:6396: śraddhāvān anasūyuś ca śṛṇuyād api yo naraḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:6397: so 'pi muktaḥ śubhāṃl lokān prāpnuyāt puṇyakarmaṇām // BhGR_18.71 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:6398: śraddhāvān anasūyuś ca yo naraḥ śṛṇuyād api,
GSP33ramgbhpu:6399: tena śravaṇamātreṇa so 'pi bhaktivirodhipāpebhyo muktaḥ puṇyakarmaṇāṃ madbhaktānāṃ lokān samūhan prāpnuyāt // BhGR_18.71 /
GSP33ramgbhpu:6401: kaccid ajñānasaṃmohaḥ pranaṣṭas te dhanañjaya // BhGR_18.72 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:6402: mayā kathitam etat pārtha tvayā avahitena cetasā kaccic śrutam,
GSP33ramgbhpu:6406: naṣṭo mohaḥ smṛtir labdhā tvatprasādān mayācyuta /
GSP33ramgbhpu:6407: sthito 'smi gatasaṃdehaḥ kariṣye vacanaṃ tava // BhGR_18.73 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:6413: paramapuruṣaśarīratayā tadātmakasya kṛtsnasya cidacidvastunaḥ atadātmābhimānarūpaś ca,
GSP33ramgbhpu:6414: nityanaimittikarūpasya karmaṇaḥ paramapuruṣārādhanatayā tatprāptyupāyabhūtasya bandhakatvabuddhirūpaś ca sarvo vinaṣṭaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:6418: vedāntavedyaḥ paramapuruṣo vāsudevas tvam iti jñānaṃ ca labdham /
GSP33ramgbhpu:6419: tataś ca bandhasnehakāruṇyapravṛddhaviparītajñānamūlāt sarvasmād avasādād vimukto gatasaṃdehaḥ svasthaḥ sthito 'smi /
GSP33ramgbhpu:6420: idānīm eva yuddhādikartavyatāviṣayam tava vacanaṃ kariṣyati yathoktaṃ yuddhādikaṃ kariṣyati ityarthaḥ // BhGR_18.73 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:6421: dhṛtarāṣṭrāya svaputrāḥ pāṇḍavāś ca yuddhe kiṃ kariṣyantīti pṛcchate
GSP33ramgbhpu:6423: ity ahaṃ vāsudevasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:6424: saṃvādam imam aśrauṣam adbhutaṃ romaharṣaṇam // BhGR_18.74 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:6426: pārthasya ca tatpitṛṣvasuḥ putrasya ca mahātmanaḥ mahābuddhes tatpadadvandvam āśritasyemaṃ romaharṣaṇam adbhutaṃ saṃvādam ahaṃ yathoktam aśrauṣam śrutavān aham // BhGR_18.74 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:6427: vyāsaprasādāc chrutavān etad guhyam ahaṃ param /
GSP33ramgbhpu:6428: yogaṃ yogeśvarāt kṛṣṇāt sākṣāt kathayataḥ svayam // BhGR_18.75 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:6429: vyāsaprasādād vyāsānugraheṇa divyacakṣuśśrotralābhād etat paraṃ yogākhyaṃ guhyaṃ
GSP33ramgbhpu:6430: yogeśvarāj jñānabalāiśvaryavīryaśaktitejasāṃ nidher bhagavataḥ kṛṣṇāt svayam eva
GSP33ramgbhpu:6432: rājan saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya saṃvādam imam adbhutam /
GSP33ramgbhpu:6433: keśavārjunayoḥ puṇyaṃ hṛṣyāmi ca muhur muhuḥ // BhGR_18.76 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:6434: keśavārjunayor imaṃ puṇyam adbhutaṃ saṃvādaṃ sākṣāc chrutaṃ smṛtvā muhur muhur hṛṣyāmi //
GSP33ramgbhpu:6435: tac ca saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya rūpam atyadbhutaṃ hareḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:6436: vismayo me mahān rājan hṛṣyāmi ca punaḥ punaḥ // BhGR_18.77 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:6437: tac cārjunāya prakāśitam aiśvaraṃ harer atyadbhutaṃ rūpaṃ mayā sākṣātkṛtaṃ saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya hṛṣyato me mahān vismayo jāyate;
GSP33ramgbhpu:6440: yatra yogeśvaraḥ kṛṣṇo yatra pārtho dhanurdharaḥ /
GSP33ramgbhpu:6441: tatra śrīr vijayo bhūtir dhruvā nītir matir mama // BhGR_18.78 //
GSP33ramgbhpu:6442: yatra yogeśvaraḥ kṛtsnasyoccāvacarūpeṇāvasthitasya cetanasyācetanasya ca vastuno ye ye svabhāvayogāḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:6446: yatra ca pārtho dhanurdharaḥ tatpitṛṣvasuḥ putraḥ tatpadadvandvaikāśrayaḥ,
GSP33ramgbhpu:6447: tatra śrīr vijayo bhūtir nītiś ca dhruvā niścalā iti matir mameti // BhGR_18.78 //
